title: 1971 NCAA University Division Outdoor Track and Field Championships
text:
The 1971 <a href="NCAA%20Men%27s%20Division%20I%20Outdoor%20Track%20and%20Field%20Championships">NCAA University Division Outdoor Track and Field Championships</a> were contested June 17−19 at the 49th annual NCAA-sanctioned track meet to determine the individual and team national champions of men's collegiate <a href="Division%20I%20%28NCAA%29">University Division</a> outdoor <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> events in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>. 
This year's outdoor meet was hosted by the <a href="University%20of%20Washington">University of Washington</a> at <a href="Husky%20Stadium">Husky Stadium</a> in <a href="Seattle%2C%20Washington">Seattle</a>. 
<a href="UCLA%20Bruins%20track%20and%20field">UCLA</a> topped the team standings, claiming their third team national title.
